name: ElasticExportBasicPriceSearchEngine
description: This plugin adds the format BasicPriceSearchEngine to the Elastic Export.
author: plentymarkets GmbH
license: GNU AFFERO GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 3, 19 November 2007

shortDescription.de: Die Integration des Datenformats BasicPriceSearchEngine-Plugin ermöglicht die Artikeldatenübertragung zum Preisportal BasicPriceSearchEngine über den elastischen Export.
shortDescription.en: The integration of the data format BasicPriceSearchEngine-Plugin enables the transfer of item data to the price search engine BasicPriceSearchEngine via the elastic export.
